text: For the movie version of BingeWorthy, coming soon, I want to start with movies that are in theaters now, and add new movies as they come out. I want to know about shows you've already seen or want to see. Also interested in movies as they show up in rentals and on DVD (or Apple TV or Netflix, etc). Post a note here, or on Facebook, or in response to this post on Twitter. Let's have fun! :rocket:
